Sentencas: In recent years, a number of ferritic interconnect materials for use in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) have been developed and are now commercially available.
Titulo: Evaluation of the oxidation and Cr evaporation properties of selected FeCr alloys used as SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: Although similar, there are substantial variations in minor alloying elements.
Titulo: Evaluation of the oxidation and Cr evaporation properties of selected FeCr alloys used as SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: This study compares the oxidation performance of five such interconnect materials: Crofer 22 H, Crofer 22 APU (ThyssenKrupp VDM), Sanergy HT (Sandvik Materials Technology), ZMG232 G10 (Hitachi Metals) and E-Brite (ATI Allegheny Ludlum).
Titulo: Evaluation of the oxidation and Cr evaporation properties of selected FeCr alloys used as SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: 1000 h exposures have been carried out in tubular furnaces at 850 degrees C, with 6 l/min airflow and 3% H2O to simulate the air side atmosphere in an SOFC.
Titulo: Evaluation of the oxidation and Cr evaporation properties of selected FeCr alloys used as SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: In addition to the oxidation tests, time resolved in-situ chromium evaporation measurements have been carried out using a novel denuder technique.
Titulo: Evaluation of the oxidation and Cr evaporation properties of selected FeCr alloys used as SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: It was found that higher Mn concentrations in the alloy lead to lower Cr evaporation.
Titulo: Evaluation of the oxidation and Cr evaporation properties of selected FeCr alloys used as SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: Nonetheless, all steels exhibit substantial Cr volatilization and coatings are needed for most SOFC applications.
Titulo: Evaluation of the oxidation and Cr evaporation properties of selected FeCr alloys used as SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: Furthermore, this study demonstrates that the mass gain data alone can be misleading, and the mass loss due to Cr volatilization needs to be taken into account.
Titulo: Evaluation of the oxidation and Cr evaporation properties of selected FeCr alloys used as SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: Neglecting Cr evaporation results in an underestimation of the oxidation rate by between 15% and 200% for the studied steel grades.
